reviewText: This a powerful witness in the battle to end abortion. Should be viewed by all who have a heart for the unborn and who weep with the Lord over the shed blood. We face judgment and we need to be voicing our lament over the lose of life. We need to see the personhood of the unborn child. If we value our own right to live, we need to protect the right to life for the unborn child. See the film and decide what you can do.
